title: Scroll to top of Careers page on navigation

requirements.summary: Implement scroll-to-top behavior in CareersPage component using useEffect hook to ensure the page always loads at the top when navigated to from any other page
acceptanceCriteria: Clicking the Careers link from the home page navigates to /careers and the page is scrolled to the top.
Clicking the Careers link from the Resources page navigates to /careers and the page is scrolled to the top.
Clicking the Careers link from any other page navigates to /careers and the page is scrolled to the top.
The scroll-to-top behavior triggers on every mount of CareersPage, not just the first visit.
No other page or component behavior is changed.

file_operations.description: Add a useEffect hook that calls window.scrollTo(0, 0) on component mount to scroll the browser viewport to the top of the page. Import useEffect from React if not already imported. Place the effect after the existing component logic but before the return statement. Do not modify any existing content, styling, or JSON-LD structured data.
